column2:
"All ARKS, welcome!
I'm Earth's Good-will Ambassador, Sachiko Kobayashi."

"I came here in hopes of showing
Earth's charms to you through my song."

"Wishing for both Earth and everyone to get closer
together, I will now sing this song.
Please listen, ☆Welcome・ARKS!☆"
"ARKS, can you feel the charms of Earth yet?"

"Everyone! We'll always be waiting
for you to come to Earth!"
"Our bonds will never cease to fade. Let's meet again!"

"Everyone, welcome!
Welcome to Earth!"
"Let’s build strong ties and stand up together as one!"
"Oooh ARKS!"
"All of the sudden, you came onto this planet"

"as if nothing had happened, exceeding
our illusions called reality."
"Let’s celebrate and dance upon our first encounter."
"ARKS. Enemies. And together with Dark Falz!"
"Ah... How wonderful our story has been woven together."

"Now, with your hands, let’s start
moving towards the future!"
"（\"PHANTASY STAR...\"）"

"Everyone, welcome!
Welcome to Earth!"
"ARKS adventure will never end."
"Now everyone! Let’s grab hold onto that glory today!"
"Let's build strong ties and stand up together as one!"

"The perfect japanese woman, the superb japanese man,
aim to be the best you can be."

"Let your imaginations run wild and
show us a glorious future."

"By using Ether communication to go
beyond our boundaries."

"The Oracle will fly through the sky,
approaching Tokyo's hospitality."

"Aah... How beautiful~
Just like a shining star."

"If it's for you, I'll make my last
shine brighter than ever!"
"（\"PHANTASY STAR...\"）"

"Everyone, welcome!
Welcome to Earth!"
"No-one can stop ARKS fantasies."

"Everyone, let's laugh and dance
to our heart's content!"

"Shake hands and shout
in this festival!"
"Oooh ARKS!"
"Earth, be good and come here at once."
"It's the super, star capital Tokyo."

"Carry that portable shrine
and advance forward."
"It's the Ultimate festival."
"Earth, be good and come here again."
"Burst the Edo Flower to life."

"Go ☆Bom-bompity-bom!☆ on the
special Japanese Drums~"
"It's an Extreme festival!"

"Rappy! Rappy!（Heave-ho-heave!）
Rappy! Rappy!（Ahoy-hoy-hoy!）"

"Rappy! Rappy!（Bom-bompity-bom!）
Rappy! Rappy!（Here we go!）"

"Rappy! Rappy!（Sachiko!）
Rappy! Rappy!（PSO!）"

"I'll always have a friend,
no doesn't matter how painful things become."
"ARKS shall revive, over and over again."
"Everyone, let's stand together and move forward."

"Fly through the universe
and become a phoenix!"

"Everyone, welcome!
Welcome to Earth!"
"ARKS adventure will never end."

"Everyone, let's meet
again tomorrow."
"Our ties shall never end~ "
"Oooh ARKS!"
"Everyone, welcome to Earth!"
"☆Welcome・ARKS!☆"

"Singer:\u3000Sachiko Kobayashi
Music and lyrics:\u3000Beat Mario"
